newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Falling tree kills U.S. tourist in Australia.
newsitem.headline: Falling tree kills U.S. tourist in Australia.

text.p: A U.S. tourist was killed in his sleep at an Australian campsite early on Monday when a large tree fell on his tent, police said.

They said the man and his wife were staying at a beachside caravan park in Victoria state when a 10-metre (30-foot) banksia, a native Australian tree, snapped and fell on their tent. His wife escaped injury.
Police said the couple, from New York State, were visiting their son and daughter-in-law, who were sleeping with their children in a nearby tent.
They said they would not be releasing the name of the man, who was 56.
